dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: erfa
dependencies.description:
ERFA (Essential Routines for Fundamental Astronomy) is a C library
containing key algorithms for astronomy.

dependencies.name: pal
dependencies.description:
The PAL library is a partial re-implementation of Pat Wallace's popular
SLALIB library written in C using a Gnu GPL license and layered on top
of the IAU's SOFA library (or the BSD-licensed ERFA) where appropriate.

dependencies.name: aoflagger
dependencies.description: RFI detector and quality analysis for astronomical radio observations.
